# Read data
```{r read, message=FALSE}
library(readr)
library(tidyverse)
students <- read_csv('students.csv')
glimpse(students)
```

```{r read2, message=FALSE}
preferences <- read_csv('preferences.csv')
glimpse(preferences)
```

```{r gather}
library(reshape2)
students_long <- melt(students, id.vars=c('First Name', 'Last Name'))
head(students_long)
```
